message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SY, cs.CR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) - The paper proposes a building-aware association scheme for mmW communication networks, which is a networking and internet architecture problem. 
2. cs.IT (Information Theory) - The paper discusses the optimization of the proposed association scheme to maximize the downlink average data rate, which is related to information theory. 
3. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper deals with millimeter-wave communication networks, which are used for high-speed multimedia applications. 
4. cs.SY (Systems and Control) - The proposed association scheme involves adjusting the directional BS association bias of the UEs, which can be seen as a control problem. 
5. cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) - Although not the main focus of the paper, the interference avoidance aspect of the proposed association scheme can be seen as a security measure for mmW communication networks.
